Class CertificateRevocationList

java.lang.Object
crypto.CertificateRevocationList
public class CertificateRevocationList extends Object
Manages certificate revocation for e-voting system.

This class is responsible for:

  • Maintaining a list of revoked certificates and their revocation information
  • Checking whether certificates have been revoked
  • Providing revocation information for specific certificates
  • Generating Certificate Revocation Lists (CRLs) for export

Thread-safe implementation using ConcurrentHashMap for managing concurrent access to the revocation list.

  • Method Details

    • revokeCertificate

      public boolean revokeCertificate(String serialNumber, String reason)
      Revokes a certificate and adds it to the revocation list.
      Parameters:
      serialNumber - The serial number of the certificate to revoke
      reason - The reason for revocation
      Returns:
      true if the certificate was successfully revoked, false if already revoked
      Throws:
      IllegalArgumentException - If the serial number is null or empty

    • isRevoked

      public boolean isRevoked(String serialNumber)
      Checks if a certificate is revoked by its serial number.
      Parameters:
      serialNumber - The serial number of the certificate
      Returns:
      true if the certificate is revoked, false otherwise

    • isRevoked

      public boolean isRevoked(X509Certificate certificate)
      Checks if an X.509 certificate is revoked.
      Parameters:
      certificate - The X.509 certificate to check
      Returns:
      true if the certificate is revoked, false otherwise

    • getRevocationInfo

      public CertificateRevocationList.RevocationInfo getRevocationInfo(String serialNumber)
      Gets the revocation information for a specific certificate.
      Parameters:
      serialNumber - The serial number of the certificate
      Returns:
      RevocationInfo object if the certificate is revoked, null otherwise

    • getAllRevokedCertificates

      public Map<String,CertificateRevocationList.RevocationInfo> getAllRevokedCertificates()
      Gets all revoked certificates and their revocation information.
      Returns:
      An unmodifiable map of all revoked certificates

    • exportCRL

      public String exportCRL()
      Exports the Certificate Revocation List in a formatted string.
      Returns:
      A formatted string containing the CRL information
